data.actual_result: You don't see this options. Only fix is to swipe right or close and reopen the app.
data.expected_result: You should see your direct messages and servers
data.short_description: [iPad only] After fresh login friends menu stretches whole screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Logout of your account - Close the app via multitasking (this issue only works when fully closing the app) - Reopen the app and login with your credentials - Observe the friends menu
